channel.title: “Inspiration” - OfficiallyThomass
channel.description:
YAYYYYY OFFICIALLYTHOMAS POSTED A NEW TRACK!!!
-Watch on YouTube: https://youtu.be/uCg1KPbvWAs
-Watch on SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/that_dj_thomas/inspiration
Ok let’s hope I get some views and likes and comments, That will be pretty cool.
This is my song inspiration, various things inspire me. One Saturday on a Band field trip, I made friends with a group of pretty girls, We talked some and that basically inspired me to better myself, work out, and basically show off my talent. Kinda like my song “They Were Never There.” What Inspires you?

item.title: “Inspiration” - OfficiallyThomass
item.dc:creator: Etchris
item.description:
Hello Thomas,
I appreciate your story.
The things that inspire me, specifically in the realm of music, are the other Auxy producers. Although at times it may seem like we are limited with what we can do in Auxy, and get stuck into making the same chords or melodies, other producers show just how diverse and universal Auxy can be.

Read full topic
